title: General election odds and poll tracker: Who would win, and will it happen in 2019?
text:
The chances of a snap election this year are slipping, with 2020 now the more likely year for a poll to take place.

Despite Brexit negotiators agreeing to a last-minute deal with the EU, Boris Johnson has put Britain on a general election footing after MPs voted for a delay to the Brexit implementation - putting his “do or die” pledge under threat.

Mr Johnson was forced to write to the President of the European Council on 19 October formally requesting for an extension to the Brexit deadline.

Opposition parties twice blocked Mr Johnson's attempt to call an early vote under the Fixed-Term Parliament Act last month, causing the odds of a 2019 election to fall. Since then, the Prime Minister has...
description: The chances of a snap election this year are slipping, with 2020 now the more likely year for a poll to take place.
